positive_examples: This is an example of ontology network.
The ontology network demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed ontology network in this context.
A typical case of ontology network would involve these features.
The concept of ontology network applies here.
A formal conceptual network that explicitly defines the relationships and hierarchies between concepts in a specific domain.
negative_examples: This is an example of neural activation network, not ontology network.
This represents conceptual network in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: NeuralActivationNetwork, or other types of ConceptualNetwork

definition: A formal representation of concepts and relationships in a knowledge domain.
